articles.author: Oliver Darcy
articles.title: A second Trump term ‘poses a threat to the existence of America as we know it,’ says The Atlantic’s top editor - CNN
articles.description: Jeffrey Goldberg, the editor-in-chief of The Atlantic, refuses to go gently into that good night.
articles.content:
Editors Note: A version of this article first appeared in the Reliable Sources newsletter. Sign up for the daily digest chronicling the evolving media landscape here.
